snippet: Two bombings believed to have been carried out by Boko Haram militants killed about 50 people at a market in the northeastern city of Gombe.
abstract: Boko Haram is believed to have carried out two bombings in Nigeria that killed about 50 people.
lead_paragraph: Two bombings believed to have been carried out by Boko Haram militants killed about 50 people at a market in the northeastern city of Gombe.

headline.main: Nigeria: Deadly Blasts Strike a Northeastern Market
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Deadly Blasts Strike a Northeastern Market
